item.title: To the far West and beyond
item.author: Kleoniki Petrou,
item.description: When listening to those words in the title immediately we all think of deserted cities with one main road, as these places were presented in the Western movies. This might be true for some places, though this article will present some nature’s most famous creations, namely the Canyons and the …

item.title: Dream a little Greek dream
item.author: Kleoniki Petrou,
item.description: With summer vacations just a stone’s throw away, it seemed ideal for me to think about possible summer destinations. The first thing that crosses all our minds when thinking about summer is, of course, sun, and consequently we think about Mediterranean countries. This article will be dedicated to my …
